artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Published by Mitaya Kihachi
description: men and women wearing blue and red, some with black and white umbrellas, in a courtyard; figures in a two-story building at left; roof in LRC
marks: ULC in the print, in black: untranslated inscripti
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Kuken-chō in the Shinmachi Pleasure Quarter
